info.title: EPA CapabilityStatement für den Medication Service
info.description: EPA CapabilityStatement für den Medication Service

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The Accept header indicates the format in which the client wishes to receive the FHIR response.

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

403.description: Device registration does not exist (if requestor role is oid_versicherter only)

404.description: Health record is in state UNKNOWN or INITIALIZED

409.description: Health record is in state SUSPENDED or MAINTENANCE

423.description: If the insurant objected to the medication process or objected to the submission of prescription and dispensation data into the ePA system, the Medication Service is locked.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The Accept header indicates the format in which the client wishes to receive the FHIR response.

parameters.name: _format
parameters.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: With _count, the client can specify the maximum number of elements to be included on one page of the response. This means the FHIR Data Service limits the result set to this maximum specified number. If no value for _count is provided, the default value set is 25.

parameters.name: _offset
parameters.description: This URL parameter indicates the (zero-based) offset of the first returned element in the collection. If no value for _offset is provided, the default value set is 0.

parameters.name: _total
parameters.description: This parameter controls whether and how the FHIR Data Service returns the total number of search results.

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

409.description: Health record is in state SUSPENDED or MAINTENANCE

423.description: If the insurant objected to the medication process or objected to the submission of prescription and dispensation data into the ePA system, the Medication Service is locked.

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: With _count, the client can specify the maximum number of elements to be included on one page of the response. This means the FHIR Data Service limits the result set to this maximum specified number. If no value for _count is provided, the default value set is 25.

parameters.name: _offset
parameters.description: This URL parameter indicates the (zero-based) offset of the first returned element in the collection. If no value for _offset is provided, the default value set is 0.

parameters.name: _total
parameters.description: This parameter controls whether and how the FHIR Data Service returns the total number of search results.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Limit the search to this date. Can specify upper or lower limits and periods by providing an upper and a lower limit.

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Limit the result bundle to this many entries. To get more entries request the next page.

parameters.name: provenance
parameters.description: Die UUID der Provenance-Instanz, die eine bestimmte Version des elektronischen Medikationsplans (eMP) identifiziert. Diese Provenance-Instanz repräsentiert den Zustand zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt und bündelt die zu diesem Zeitpunkt aktiven eMP-Elemente. Wird kein provenance-Parameter angegeben, liefert die Operation den aktuellsten bekannten Zustand des eMP zurück.
